fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations Amsterdam: £51.30 bmi British Midland from Heathrow. Must be booked online (£5 extra if booked by phone 0870 6070555). Valid for departures indefinitely. No minimum stay, maximum one year. bmi British Midland (flybmi.com). Paris: £69 British Airways from Manchester. Must be booked online (£10 extra if booked by phone 0845 7733377) and at least 30 days before travel. Valid for departures indefinitely. British Airways (ba.com). New York: £165 United Airlines from Heathrow to JFK or Newark. Must be booked by June 30. Valid for departures November 1-December 10. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Quest Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). Hong Kong: £289.50 Cathay Pacific from Heathrow. Price based on a package for two travelling together and including three nights' accom modation and airport transfers. Must be booked by July 7. Valid for outbound departures August 1-September 30. Minimum stay three nights, maximum one week. Airline Warehouse (0870 7707339, airlinewarehouse.com). Sydney: £527 Asiana Airlines from Heathrow, Gatwick, Birmingham or Manchester via Seoul. Must be booked by June 30. Valid for departures July 1-15. Minimum stay seven nights, maximum six months. Bridge the World (0870 4441716, bridgetheworld.com). Los Angeles: £209 United Airlines from Heathrow. Must be booked by June 30. Valid for departures November 1-December 10. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Travelbag (0870 8901458, travelbag.co.uk). The pick of the rest Alicante: £79 Monarch charter from Manchester. Departs July 8 for seven nights. Avro (0870 0360116, avro.co.uk). Seville: £99 GB Airways from Gatwick. Must be booked online by July 26. Valid for departures November 1-December 17, then January 1-February 11. Book via British Airways (ba.com). Singapore: £399 Singapore Airlines from Heathrow or Manchester. Valid for departures until August 31. No minimum stay, maximum three months. Quest Travel (0870 4423513, questtravel.com). And the rail alternative Paris/Brussels: £59. Lille: £55 Eurostar from Waterloo or Ashford (no advance purchase required but may not be available at last minute). Same day weekend return fare. Valid for Saturday and Sunday departures. Eurostar (08705 186186, eurostar.com).
